page.title: 10THE LOST VILLAGE
page.content: Near Longford village there are the remains of a lost village. It was called Bupton. Bupton was mentioned in the original Domesday book. The sign of the lost village is a few circular bumps in the field at Bupton corner. The lost village had a manor. Now there is nothing there. The villages were deserted because the ground was not good enough or they ran out of food from the trees and plants. Some villages died because most of the people died of illnees or because of the changeover from arable to sheep and dairy farming. There are lost villages all over Derbyshire.
